from:
localize('toggle.chatControlsDescription', "Toggle visibility of the Copilot Controls in title bar"), 5, false,
			ChatContextKeys.supported
by:
localize('toggle.chatControlsDescription', \"Toggle visibility of the Copilot Controls in title bar\"), 5, false,
			ContextKeyExpr.and(
				ChatContextKeys.supported,
				ContextKeyExpr.has('config.chat.commandCenter.enabled')
			)
